abstract: The dispute between the oil giant BP and its partners in the Russian joint venture TNK-BP escalated on Wednesday when the two parties could not even agree to be on talking terms with each other and one threatened legal action.
lead_paragraph: The dispute between the oil giant BP and its partners in the Russian joint venture TNK-BP escalated on Wednesday when the two parties could not even agree to be on talking terms with each other and one threatened legal action.

headline.main: BP Says Talks With Venture Investors Continue
